message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. I think this is a fair price considering the value it brings to the table.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, $800000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it. I think this is a fair price considering the value it brings to the table, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it at this price.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to make a serious commitment to purchase the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $950000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value it brings to the table.

Thank you for meeting me halfway, Alice. However, $950000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $920000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it brings to the table, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it at this price.

I understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $930000. This is as low as I can go, considering the value it brings to the table.

Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to make concessions. I'm willing to pay $915000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it brings to the table, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it at this price.

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more attempt to reach a deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $920000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
